(c) On October 29, 2025, the Board of Directors of Chevron elected Amit R. Ghai to the position of Controller of Chevron, effective March 1, 2026. In this role, Mr. Ghai will serve as Chevron’s principal accounting officer. Mr. Ghai, age 53, has held positions with Chevron and its subsidiaries since 2004, and currently serves as Assistant Controller, a position he has held since October 2020. Prior to that, he served as Controller, Downstream & Chemicals, from July 2019 through October 2020, and as General Manager, Finance, Supply and Trading, from June 2016 through July 2019. Prior to these roles, Mr. Ghai held numerous positions of increasing responsibility in the areas of finance, accounting, and treasury.
